thread.title: Leading Tech Repair Brand, uBreakiFix, Opens In Maple Grove
thread.title_full: Leading Tech Repair Brand, uBreakiFix, Opens In Maple Grove

author: admin
title: Leading Tech Repair Brand, uBreakiFix, Opens In Maple Grove
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/12/2015 @ 7:15 AM   uBreakiFix 
MAPLE GROVE, Minn., Oct. 12, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- uBreakiFix specializes in same-day repair service of small electronics, repairing cracked screens, water damage, software issues, camera issues and other technical problems at its more than 130 stores nationwide. Its newest location, uBreakiFix Maple Grove , opened Oct. 9 at 7888 Main St. N. 
uBreakiFix has saved Americans an estimated $500 million in replacement costs since its inception in 2009 and has an average repair cost for electronics of $85. The company is known for its timely service and hassle-free customer experience, and offers repair services for all brands of smartphones, tablets, computers, game consoles and more. Each repair comes with a 90-day warranty. 
This is the first location for co-owners Joe Rintelman and Ryan Kaiser. They are committed to bringing the highest quality technology repair option to the community and have plans to open three more stores over the next two years. 
"We are looking forward to serving users of tech in Maple Grove and beyond with our extraordinary service, high quality parts and reputable warranty," Rintelman said. "We want to provide customers with an efficient, cost-effective alternative to discarding their broken devices. We are really excited to become part of the fabric of the community." 
On May 19, 2015, uBreakiFix repaired its one-millionth device. By 2016, the brand expects to have 175 stores across North America. 
WHERE:
